ðŸ“– Summary: Walrus is a Python library that simplifies working with Redis by extending the popular redis-py client. It provides Pythonic container classes for Redis data types, along with features like autocomplete, caching, full-text search, graph store, and experimental models, making it easier to build applications that leverage Redis.
